name: Alabama Water Company
description: Alabama Water Company is a leading provider of water and wastewater services in the southeastern United States. Established in 1995, the company has grown to serve over 250,000 customers across Alabama, delivering safe and reliable drinking water while maintaining a commitment to environmental stewardship and sustainability. Alabama Water Company operates numerous treatment facilities and distribution systems, ensuring compliance with state and federal regulations. The company invests heavily in infrastructure improvements and modernization projects to enhance water quality and service reliability. In addition to water services, Alabama Water Company offers wastewater management solutions, contributing to the region's environmental health. With a focus on innovation, the company utilizes advanced technologies for water monitoring and leak detection, helping to conserve resources and reduce operational costs. Alabama Water Company's mission is to provide exceptional customer service and high-quality water while promoting sustainable practices in the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Alabama Water Company | Reliable Water and Wastewater Services
seo.meta_description: Alabama Water Company provides safe drinking water and wastewater management services across Alabama. Learn more about our commitment to sustainability and customer service.

faq.question: What services does Alabama Water Company provide?
faq.answer: Alabama Water Company provides drinking water supply and wastewater management services.

faq.question: Where is Alabama Water Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Alabama Water Company is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: When was Alabama Water Company founded?
faq.answer: Alabama Water Company was founded in 1995.
